name: BioFuse
description:
Updates take a while, granted. Remember, this is being made by 2 people. Suggestions are always appreciated.

BioFuse is an interactive text game made in C#, AND Batch! BioFuse is a simple RPG much like the 'Choose your own adventure' but with more options, statistics, and fun!

The posts on http://www.gamejolt.com stating that any versions below 0.2.0 being outdated material, is actuallynot true. The batch version of BioFuse is still continuing. :)
